sense.name: wear off; die down
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[abstract] SUBSIDE NP1[theme] SUBSIDE
sense.examples: The pain subsided. Mark's horrible fear of death subsided as the car drove away. Tenses with Syria have subsided. Has racism subsided or increased in America?

sense.name: sink to a lower level; descend
sense.examples: If you buy a house that was build on soil that has subsided, beware of foundation cracks. The flood waters have subsided from the neighborhood.
